articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Rohit rues Shami's absence in giving Mukesh vs Prasidh verdict for 1st SA Test - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On the eve of the India vs South Africa 1st Test, Rohit rued the absence of Shami, in deciding India's third seamer between Mukesh Kumar and Prasidh Krishna. | Cricket
articles.content: There wouldn't have been a debate about India's pace-bowling line-uphad it not been for Mohammed Shami's injury. Jasprit Bumrah, who made his Test debut in South Africa five years back, is a certaint… [+2704 chars]

articles.author: Olalekan Adigun
articles.title: Malaria Prevention: WHO's Second Vaccine Approval - BNN Breaking
articles.description: As summer nears, the importance of malaria prevention in Sub-Saharan Africa is heightened. The WHO-approved R21 Matrix M vaccine presents a significant advancement in malaria prevention.
articles.content: Sub-Saharan Africa is known for its high rates of malaria, a life-threatening disease transmitted by mosquitoes. This parasitic illness, caused by the Plasmodium parasite, claims approximately 400,00… [+2454 chars]
